channel.title: The Zombie Circus
channel.description: This is where The Zombie goes to drink, vent, drink, play Punk Rock, drink, play Metal, drink, play Rock~N~Roll, drink, tell stories, drink... You get the idea...
channel.itunes:subtitle: Zombies need alcohol and loud music too!
channel.itunes:author: The Zombie
channel.itunes:summary: This is where The Zombie goes to drink, vent, drink, play Punk Rock, drink, play Metal, drink, play Rock~N~Roll, drink, tell stories, drink... You get the idea...

item.title: The Crash And Burn Circus
item.description: I haven't done this since springtime... Life and a concrete wall got in the way, but I'm back. That's right, fuckers. It's a new episode of the Zombie Circus!!!
item.dc:creator: The Zombie
item.itunes:summary: I haven't done this since springtime... Life and a concrete wall got in the way, but I'm back. That's right, fuckers. It's a new episode of the Zombie Circus!!!

item.title: Springtime 2010
item.description: The Zombie Circus is back with lots of drunken shenanigans and guest co-host Jeff Macprang. We played some summertime shit and drank a lot of vodka. Motley Crue, Sublime, LA Guns, Buckcherry and much more. All for the low, low price of zero dollars. Act now and you will also receive a big bunch of nothing! Hurry. Supplies are limited.
item.dc:creator: The Zombie

item.title: The Christmas Circus
item.description: The Christmas edition of the Zombie Circus... Really? YEP. How about some Twisted Sister? Alice Cooper? Ozzy? The Ramones? Yes, motherfuckers, the Zombie is back for some Christmas shit!!! Merry happy hanakwanicmas!!!
item.dc:creator: The Zombie
item.itunes:summary: The Christmas edition of the Zombie Circus... Really? YEP. How about some Twisted Sister? Alice Cooper? Ozzy? The Ramones? Yes, motherfuckers, the Zombie is back for some Christmas shit!!! Merry happy hanakwanicmas!!!

item.title: The Halloween circus!!!
item.description: Look at the blade… Look into my eyes… Yep, it’s the Halloween episode of the Zombie Circus!!! Blitzkid, The Who, Alice Cooper, Golden Earring., Cradle Of Filth, HIM, all sorts of evil shit!!! It’s Halloween time, MOTHERFUCKERS!!!!! Check it out at http://motleyzombie.podomatic.com or http://myspace.com/zombiepod. This is some good shit. You know you want a hit. Peer pressure. Just take one drag. Dance down at the Zombie Zoo… It’s all part of the Zombie Circus…

item.title: Zombie Circus Number 17
item.description: Ozzy… Green Day… Sublime… North Side Kings… You gettin’ the picture? More good Rock~N~Roll… Me being drunk and runnin’ my pie hole. It’s the Zombie Circus back in your face! motleyzombie.podomatic.com or myspace.com/zombiepod Check it out...
item.dc:creator: The Zombie

item.title: Episode 16
item.description: Pantera... Thrice... Pearl Jam... You're not listening yet? What are you? Some kinda fucktard? Maga-fucking-deth... Tune in to the latest Zombie Circus at http://www.myspace.com/zombiepod Grab some vodka, dope, your cock... Whatever... Have a good time and listen to the good tunes I put together for ya. WTOTW

item.title: Zombie Circus Episode 15
item.description: A new Zombie Circus is up! I'm not sure what's in it because I was drunk as usual, but here's what I do know... There's Lita Ford, Halestorm, Dead By Sunrise, and a buncha other cool shit. Of course more drunken ramblings. But most importantly GOOD ROCK ~N~ ROLL. Listen up, suckas!!!

item.title: CRUEFEST EDITION
item.description: A tribute to the Crue and my late brother Jeff...
item.dc:creator: The Zombie
item.itunes:summary: A tribute to the Crue and my late brother Jeff...

item.title: Zombie Circus Episode 13
item.description: Check out the latest Zombie Circus, featuring more drunken ramblings and songs by Red Hot Chili Peppers, a Motley Crue/Linkin Park collaboration, a tribute to Traci Michaelz and his band you may not have heard of… The Peppermint Creeps… You can check ‘em out at www.peppermintcreepsonline and you can listen to the Zombie Circus at www.myspace.com/zombiepod or motleyzombie.podomatic.com. Go ahead and do it. Touch it baby. You know you want to.

item.title: Zombie Circus 11
item.description: You are cordially invited (read: COMMANDED) to check out the latest Zombie Circus, featuring more drunken ramblings and songs by Anti-Nowhere League, Soul Asylum, a burp-fest, and a new band out of Santa Monica called Vizionz. Those guys are on their way to the top, and you can check ‘em out before they get there at www.myspace.com/vizionzmuzic . As always, you can listen to the Zombie Circus at www.myspace.com/zombiepod or motleyzombie.podomatic.com . Be there or suck. ☻/ /▌ / \
